channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: fb382eab-e894-4461-af04-94435c366c3f
Display name: Container Registry Tasks Contributor
Description: Provides permissions to configure, read, list, trigger, or cancel Container Registry Tasks, Task Runs, Task Logs, Quick Runs, Quick Builds, and Task Agent Pools. Permissions granted for Tasks management can be used for full registry data plane permissions including reading/writing/deleting container images in registries. Permissions granted for Tasks management can also be used to run customer authored build directives and run scripts to build software artifacts.
Link: https://management.azure.com/fb382eab-e894-4461-af04-94435c366c3f?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: afc680e2-a938-412d-b213-9a49efa7fb83
Display name: Azure Backup Snapshot Contributor
Description: Provide permissions to backup identity to manage RPC snapshots
Link: https://management.azure.com/afc680e2-a938-412d-b213-9a49efa7fb83?api-version=2022-04-01
